statements: SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases;
SELECT disease_name, location FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, disease_name, start_date FROM InfectiousDiseases ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, disease_name, end_date FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, disease_name, location FROM InfectiousDiseases ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, start_date, end_date FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE disease_name LIKE 'COVID%';
SELECT id, disease_name, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text, start_date FROM InfectiousDiseases ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, ST_X(location) AS latitude, ST_Y(location) AS longitude FROM patients WHERE ST_X(location) > 0;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients WHERE gender IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY gender;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC, age ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT patient_id, location, age FROM patients WHERE ST_Y(location) > 50 ORDER BY patient_id LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases;
SELECT country, city, date FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM DiseaseSpreadAnalysis ORDER BY spread_probability DESC;
SELECT source_city, target_city, spread_probability FROM DiseaseSpreadAnalysis WHERE simulation_result = 'Successful';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description, implementation_date FROM DiseaseControlMeasures WHERE measure_effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT id, country, city, latitude, longitude FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases;
SELECT city, country FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT source_city, target_city, spread_probability FROM DiseaseSpreadAnalysis ORDER BY spread_probability DESC;
SELECT measure_name, measure_effectiveness FROM DiseaseControlMeasures WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT infection_type, detection_date FROM infection_data WHERE infection_type LIKE 'COVID%';
SELECT most_affected_location FROM spread_analysis WHERE analysis_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT infection_type, detection_date FROM infection_data WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM spread_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Infections WHERE disease_id = 2 ORDER BY date_infected DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.age, Diseases.name FROM Patients JOIN Infections ON Patients.patient_id = Infections.patient_id JOIN Diseases ON Infections.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id;
SELECT Locations.location_id, AVG(Patients.age) AS avg_age FROM Patients JOIN Locations ON Patients.location_id = Locations.location_id GROUP BY Locations.location_id;
SELECT Diseases.name, COUNT(*) AS num_cases FROM Infections JOIN Diseases ON Infections.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id GROUP BY Diseases.name ORDER BY num_cases DESC;
